mapper.select: select ss_id, s_usid, ss_name, ss_state, sg_id, rs_ids, ss_date, ss_capacity, ss_address, ss_coordinate, remark, delflag, opt_id, optime from t_sortingstationinfo where delflag=0

select ss_id, s_usid, ss_name, ss_state, sg_id, rs_ids, ss_date, ss_capacity, ss_address, ss_coordinate, remark, delflag, opt_id, optime from t_sortingstationinfo where delflag=0 and ss_address=#{ss_address}
select max(ss_id) from t_sortingstationinfo where delflag=0;
mapper.insert: insert into t_sortingstationinfo( ss_name, ss_state, ss_date, ss_capacity, ss_address, ss_coordinate, remark, delflag, opt_id ) values( #{ss_name}, #{ss_state}, #{ss_date}, #{ss_capacity}, #{ss_address}, #{ss_coordinate}, #{remark}, #{delflag}, #{opt_id} )
mapper.update: update t_sortingstationinfo set delflag=1 where ss_id=#{ss_id}

update t_sortingstationinfo set ss_name=#{ss_name}, ss_state=#{ss_state}, ss_date=#{ss_date}, ss_capacity=#{ss_capacity}, ss_address=#{ss_address}, ss_coordinate=#{ss_coordinate}, remark=#{remark} where ss_id=#{ss_id}
